# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="6480b-102">Respondendo em Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6480b-103">Para responder a uma mensagem de cada vez:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-104">Na sua lista de mensagens, escolha a mensagem a que pretende responder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-105">No topo direito do painel de mensagens, selecione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="6480b-106">**Resposta** ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="6480b-107">**Responda a todos.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-108">Digite a sua mensagem e, em seguida, selecione **Enviar**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6480b-109">Para responder automaticamente a todas as mensagens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-110">Ir para</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="6480b-111">**Configurações**  >  **Ver todas as Definições de Outlook**  >  **Correio**  >  **Respostas automáticas** para abrir as [definições de respostas automáticas](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-112">Selecione o botão de alternar **Ativar respostas automáticas**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-113">Selecionar as **respostas Enviar apenas durante um período de tempo** a caixa de verificação permite-lhe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6480b-114">Só envie respostas quando quiser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6480b-115">Se não definir um período de tempo, a sua resposta automática permanece acesa até que o desligue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6480b-116">Bloqueie o seu calendário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6480b-117">Recusar automaticamente novos convites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6480b-118">Recusar e cancelar as minhas reuniões durante este período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-119">Na caixa de mensagens, escreva uma mensagem para enviar às pessoas durante o tempo em que estiver fora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-120">Para enviar apenas respostas aos seus contactos, selecione as **respostas enviar apenas para contactos.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="6480b-121">Seleccione **Guardar**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6480b-122">Saiba mais sobre [o encaminhamento automático em Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6480b-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
